traits.name: Indomitable (3/Day)
entries: Gunvald can reroll a saving throw he fails. He must use the new roll.

traits.name: Menacing Blows (1/Turn)
entries: Gunvald deals an extra 6 ({@damage 1d12}) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the start of Gunvald's next turn.

traits.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, Gunvald can regain 15 hit points.

actions.name: Battleaxe
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d8 + 5 damage) slashing damage, or 10 (1d10 + 5 damage) slashing damage when used with two hands, plus 6 (1d12 damage) slashing damage if Gunvald uses Menacing Blows.

actions.name: Javelin
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +8 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 8 (1d6 + 5 damage) piercing damage, plus 6 (1d12 damage) piercing damage if Gunvald uses Menacing Blows.
